Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-58058 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-58058 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.2-12, affected by CVE-2025-58058
